00022 // r2 and p2 operators
00023 ManyBodyOperator OpMeanOsciQuanta = {
00024  name : "MeanOsciQuanta",
00025  rank : 0,
00026  pi : 0,
00027  dim : 6,
00028  size : 6,
00029  par : NULL,
00030  me : calcMeanOsciQuantaod
00031 };
00032 
00033 
00034 static void ob_moscquanta(void* par,
00035                           const Gaussian *G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00036                           const GaussianAux *X, MeanOsciQuanta* q)
00037 {
00038   complex double mr2, mp2;
00039 
00040   mr2 = (3.0*X->alpha + X->rho2)* X->Q;
00041   mp2 = (3*X->lambda + X->pi2) * X->Q;
00042 
00043   q->r2[0] = mr2;
00044   q->r2[1] = (1+G1->xi)/2* mr2;
00045   q->r2[2] = (1-G1->xi)/2* mr2;
00046 
00047   q->p2[0] = mp2;
00048   q->p2[1] = (1+G1->xi)/2* mp2;
00049   q->p2[2] = (1-G1->xi)/2* mp2;
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 void calcMeanOsciQuantaod(void* Par,
00054                           const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00055                           const SlaterDetAux* X,
00056                           MeanOsciQuanta* q)
00057 {
00058   OneBodyOperator op_ob_moscquanta = {dim: 6, opt: 1, par: NULL, me: ob_moscquanta};
00059 
00060   calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_ob_moscquanta, q);
00061 }

00064 static inline double dsqr(double x)
00065 {
00066   return x*x;
00067 }

00069 
00070 void writeprojectedMeanOscillatorQuanta(FILE* fp, double omega,
00071                                         const Projection* P,
00072                                         const MeanOsciQuanta** Q,
00073                                         const Eigenstates* E)
00074 {
00075   int odd=P->odd;
00076   int jmax=P->jmax;
00077 
00078   int p,j,i;
00079 
00080   char prefix[8];
00081 
00082   int* idx;
00083   int ngood;
00084   complex double *norm, *H;
00085   MeanOsciQuanta *q;
00086   
00087 
00088   for (p=0; p<=1; p++)
00089     for (j=odd; j<jmax; j=j+2) {
00090       
00091       ngood = E->ngood[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00092 
00093       if (ngood) {
00094 
00095         if(odd) sprintf(prefix, "[%d/2%c]", j, p ? '-' : '+'); 
00096         else    sprintf(prefix, "[%d%c]", j/2, p ? '-' : '+'); 
00097 
00098         idx = E->index[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00099         norm = E->norm[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00100         H = E->v[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00101 
00102         q = Q[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00103 
00104         fprintf(fp, "\n%s N     = ", prefix); 
00105         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++) 
00106           fprintf(fp, "   %8.5f", creal(norm[idx[i]]));
00107         fprintf(fp, "\n%s H     = ", prefix); 
00108         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++) 
00109           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", hbc*creal(H[idx[i]]));
00110         fprintf(fp, "\n%s Q     = ", prefix); 
00111         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++) 
00112           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", 
00113                   0.5*(
00114                        creal(q[idx[i]].p2[0]/norm[idx[i]])/(mnucleon*omega) +
00115                        mnucleon*omega*creal(q[idx[i]].r2[0]/norm[idx[i]])
00116                        ));
00117         fprintf(fp, "\n%s Qp    = ", prefix); 
00118         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++) 
00119           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", 
00120                   0.5*(
00121                        creal(q[idx[i]].p2[1]/norm[idx[i]])/(mnucleon*omega) +
00122                        mnucleon*omega*creal(q[idx[i]].r2[1]/norm[idx[i]])
00123                        ));
00124         fprintf(fp, "\n%s Qn    = ", prefix); 
00125         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++) 
00126           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", 
00127                   0.5*(
00128                        creal(q[idx[i]].p2[2]/norm[idx[i]])/(mnucleon*omega) +
00129                        mnucleon*omega*creal(q[idx[i]].r2[2]/norm[idx[i]])
00130                        ));
00131 
00132         fprintf(fp, "\n");        
00133       }
00134     }
00135 }
